It crashes when using 2500


`ganache-cli -a 2000`


https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/35252/solidity-for-loop-over-a-huge-amount-of-data





Second column is increasing gas cost as we iterate through larger number of existing bids.

To change order of bids, dramatically reduces number of comparisons:

`✓ Should be able to witdraw and send to beneficiary too (184301ms)`
